pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# PicImageSearch✨ 聚合识图引擎 用于以图搜源✨

📖文档 · 🐛提交建议

## 支持- [x] [Ascii2D](https://ascii2d.net/)- [x] [Baidu](https://graph.baidu.com/)- [x] [E-Hentai](https://e-hentai.org/)- [x] [ExHentai](https://exhentai.org/)- [x] [Google](https://www.google.com/imghp)- [x] [Iqdb](https://iqdb.org/)- [x] [SauceNAO](https://saucenao.com/)- [x] [TraceMoe](https://trace.moe/)- [x] [Yandex](https://yandex.com/images/search)- [x] 同步/异步## 简要说明详细见[文档](https://pic-image-search.kituin.fun/) 或者[`demo`](https://github.com/kitUIN/PicImageSearch/tree/main/demo) `同步`请使用`from PicImageSearch.sync import ...`导入 `异步`请使用`from PicImageSearch import Network,...`导入 **推荐使用异步**### 安装- 此包需要 Python 3.7 或更新版本。- `pip install PicImageSearch`- 或者- `pip install PicImageSearch -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple`## Star History[![Star History](https://starchart.cc/kitUIN/PicImageSearch.svg)](https://starchart.cc/kitUIN/PicImageSearch)
